title: Sending pictures over FB Messenger - Ultra Low Res
content:
Hi,

Just noticed something very weird, as I was checking on my PC some photos I sent through fb's messenger and noticed all of them are being sent are 480x360 pics.

Steps to check:
1. Open default camera app - take picture at full res
2. Open fb messenger and a chat with someone
3. Click the send icon and send your picture
4. Click on the picture you've just sent, click More -> Info, resolution = 480x360?

Anyone else encountering this? Where could the issue be? It seems to send full res on a S10+ and on a P30Pro.

Thanks.
